positive.review: So far, its pretty good, I used it to see My livestream chat, it showed everything fine, but if youre playing a game [like vrchat] then it's scaling feature gets quite annoying sometimes and it grows or shrinks randomly, im sure they have a feature to fix that but ive not found it yet
great work, jsut a shame we cannot get this in openXR
VR would not be as accessible without this.
Playspacing is fun.
nice
very easy to use!  (with time)
it help lot

So far, its pretty good, I used it to see My livestream chat, it showed everything fine, but if youre playing a game [like vrchat] then it's scaling feature gets quite annoying sometimes and it grows or shrinks randomly, im sure they have a feature to fix that but ive not found it yet
Good tool to have, but watch out, anti-virus likes to block it by all means. Make the exception in your anti-virus program and all is well.
A very fun and interactive way to manage streaming software like OBS, etc.

Not too keen on the new UI myself but it works well enough but I'd like to mention something inside the app has procked windows defender saying theres a Trojan so yeah thought that'd be worth mentioning but I personally would not know where.

being that steamVR is absolute garbage, something like this needs to come out for us who DONT use steam - for things like DCS and so on.  
  It's amazing, would be IDEAL for such a use case.... but no one on DCS wants to use SteamVR once they know better.
   SteamVR EATS FRAMES!
Really useful and easy to use! Definitely a lifesaver for me.
Been using OVR Toolkit for a while, works well, has some weird issues here and there, but overall it does what I want it to. Very useful for VRChat :p
usefull for vr and tbh nothing else to say its just good
very useful, especially for putting discord on my wrist

[h2]OVR Toolkit - Desktop Overlay Review[/h2]

OVR Toolkit is a versatile and powerful VR desktop overlay that adds convenience and functionality to your VR setup:  

1. [b]Wrist-Mounted Display:[/b] Provides a Pip-Boy-like overlay on your wrist for quick access to key information.  

2. [b]System Monitoring:[/b] Displays controller battery percentage, time, GPU usage, VRAM usage, and RAM usage.  

3. [b]Window Attachment:[/b] Allows you to attach multiple windows from your desktop to your VR overlay, not just one.  

4. [b]Application Control:[/b] Control applications such as Spotify directly from your VR overlay.  

5. [b]Enhanced Productivity:[/b] Lets you monitor and interact with multiple applications in VR without removing your headset.  

Overall, OVR Toolkit is an excellent addition for VR users who want more control, convenience, and functionality in their virtual environment.  

[hr][/hr]
Essential for doomscrolling while in VR
The best. I always use this and it's reliable.
great work, jsut a shame we cannot get this in openXR
VR would not be as accessible without this.
Playspacing is fun.

negative.review: Well, it used to be amazing, but the recent updates have made this thing super clunky and finicky. I dunno what they did to screw it up so bad, but it wasn't broken to begin with. Feels like enshitification. If they roll it back and fix it, I can recommend it again.
Not worth the price. Steam already provides the same built in features that this has, and it's way less finicky than this.

I used to consider it one of the best VR addons/tools, but after the last 2–3 major updates I feel I can’t recommend it anymore. 
The UI has gotten worse and less intuitive, and the performance is terrible even on a high-end system. 
Window/App capture is also extremely unreliable — it often doesn’t work or simply stops working at random after a while.
On top of that, it now seems that window/panel placement is broken as well: positions and constraints are no longer saved or maintained (*sometimes).
Fantastic experience.
bad ui and interface
setting up windows is horrible

ever since the new UI iv had no end of problems now with the windows mainly the fact they keep resetting to Select an app or just refusing to connect to the currently open applications. i really like this one more due to the fact u can change the hide when and radius but the fact it keeps resetting the window definitely the one for my desktop to where i can no longer select my desktop and have to respawn, position and setup the new window olmost every reboot. i hope this is a fixable bug and not just a me side broken files. even validating doesnt fix. 

besides that issue i still prefer this app the most for desktop and app viewing while in vr for now just a no recommend due to the bug

Well, it used to be amazing, but the recent updates have made this thing super clunky and finicky. I dunno what they did to screw it up so bad, but it wasn't broken to begin with. Feels like enshitification. If they roll it back and fix it, I can recommend it again.

This program is broken.
Yesterday it rendered a game I had played earlier with OVR toolkit completely unplayable. The game just kept freezing every time I looked anywhere near the OVR window and CTD'd several times!
I ended up closing OVR and suddenly the game ran smoothly with any issues at all!
Earlier today I set up everything before I had a live stream scheduled. Then when the time came (hadn't done anything, hadn't restarted any programs or changed anything, just set everything up and leave it running) OVR had decided to just ignore everything I'd done and reset the settings. Including some of the settings that are used in the tutorial, now they were just turned off..!
Even mid-game, it randomly decided to resize and move the window while it was hidden!

This software is some of the most infuriatingly stupid POS I've ever had to deal in my time in vr!
Save your money and get something else. Anything is better than this crap, which really sucks as I've heard good things about the older versions...

It was good till it lasted 
Now am on vrchat It renders weirdly and it's annoying.

I used to consider it one of the best VR addons/tools, but after the last 2–3 major updates I feel I can’t recommend it anymore. 
The UI has gotten worse and less intuitive, and the performance is terrible even on a high-end system. 
Window/App capture is also extremely unreliable — it often doesn’t work or simply stops working at random after a while.
On top of that, it now seems that window/panel placement is broken as well: positions and constraints are no longer saved or maintained (*sometimes).
Fantastic experience.

new update tried to change ui... ended up just breaking or removing half the features i use

for all u who hate this as much as i do click the cog wheel in library/manage/betas/ and change your version back
Not worth the price. Steam already provides the same built in features that this has, and it's way less finicky than this.
windows defender flagged OpenHardwareMonitorLib.sys as a trojan. love ovr but I dont use it nearly enough to possibly keep malware on my pc.

sept.5th my windows defender quarantined a trojan virus vigorf.A.

I have uninstalled the program some time after the 5th but seems it was in a recent update .but didnt notice windows quarantined the threat must have missed the notification. wont use this ever again. windows antivirus software did its job 10/10. saved my pc
The fps hit i got from using this is the equivalent of using ray-tracing aka terrible
The new UI sucks why fix what wasn't broken. In fact its better to say why break what wasn't broken in this case.
Terrible UI update moves the window arrow in the middle of the window so you cant use it
The second that i get in to a game the window i add vanished and OVR isnt on my wrist anymore
JUST GET XSOVERLAY ITS THREE TIMES MORE EFFICIENT THAN THIS BLOATWARE
bad ui and interface
Very hard to control.
setting up windows is horrible
Has virus

ever since the new UI iv had no end of problems now with the windows mainly the fact they keep resetting to Select an app or just refusing to connect to the currently open applications. i really like this one more due to the fact u can change the hide when and radius but the fact it keeps resetting the window definitely the one for my desktop to where i can no longer select my desktop and have to respawn, position and setup the new window olmost every reboot. i hope this is a fixable bug and not just a me side broken files. even validating doesnt fix. 

besides that issue i still prefer this app the most for desktop and app viewing while in vr for now just a no recommend due to the bug
gave me a virus
